description: This Rust source file defines metric handler structs and error types for a performance metrics system, including implementations for handling basic and state metrics, along with associated tests and re-exports.

classes.name: MetricHandlerError
classes.description: Enumeration of error types for metric handlers, implementing Display and Error traits.

classes.name: BasicMetricHandler
classes.description: Handler for basic numeric metrics, implementing the Observer trait.

classes.name: StateMetricHandler
classes.description: Handler for state change metrics, implementing the Observer trait.

methods.name: MetricHandlerError::fmt
methods.description: Formats the error message for MetricHandlerError.

methods.name: BasicMetricHandler::new
methods.description: Creates a new BasicMetricHandler with specified id and callback.

methods.name: StateMetricHandler::new
methods.description: Creates a new StateMetricHandler with specified id and callback.

methods.name: BasicMetricHandler::on_metric_update
methods.description: Handles metric update for BasicMetric, invoking callback if type matches.

methods.name: StateMetricHandler::on_metric_update
methods.description: Handles metric update for StateMetric, invoking callback if type matches.

methods.name: BasicMetricHandler::get_id
methods.description: Returns the id of the BasicMetricHandler.

methods.name: StateMetricHandler::get_id
methods.description: Returns the id of the StateMetricHandler.
